strategy_reasoning: Focusing on the 'Nature/Growth' metaphor reinforces our brand name 'Pollinations' and creates a wholesome, non-intimidating vibe. It visualizes the creative process as something organic and natural, rather than technical, which aligns with our mission to make AI accessible and friendly.
